    \index{theia \textit{(package)}!theia.helpers \textit{(package)}!theia.helpers.settings \textit{(module)}|(}
\section{Module theia.helpers.settings}

    \label{theia:helpers:settings}
Module to initiate all global variables for theia.


%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
%%                               Functions                               %%
%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%

  \subsection{Functions}

    \label{theia:helpers:settings:init}
    \index{theia \textit{(package)}!theia.helpers \textit{(package)}!theia.helpers.settings \textit{(module)}!theia.helpers.settings.init \textit{(function)}}

    \vspace{0.5ex}

\hspace{.8\funcindent}\begin{boxedminipage}{\funcwidth}

    \raggedright \textbf{init}(\textit{dic})

    \vspace{-1.5ex}

    \rule{\textwidth}{0.5\fboxrule}
\setlength{\parskip}{2ex}
    Initiate globals with dictionary.

    dic: dictionary holding values for globals. [dictionary]

\setlength{\parskip}{1ex}
    \end{boxedminipage}
